casebody.data:
Stanley V. Tucker v. John S. Pinney et al. (3111)

Borden, Spallone and Daly, Js.

Argued March 15 decision released May 7, 1985 Stanley V. Tucker, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff). Arthur A. Palmunen, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

We have carefully reviewed the plaintiffs claims in this matter and find them to be without merit. See Tucker v. American Ins. Co., 3 Conn. App. 397, 399, 488 A.2d 1278 (1985).

There is no error.
